ygData.subject: Re: Did some testing....
ygData.msgSnippet: soo..... does this mean... using 2, 6, 18, i DON T have to switch them? I can just hold one and equip the other????? this will make this method of combat even
ygData.messageBody:
soo.....
does this mean...
using 2, 6, 18, i DON'T have to switch them? I can just hold one and equip
the other?????
this will make this method of combat even more awesome for me...since i
won't have to fear dropping horn/mandolin while twisting away...
thus freeing up a hand to move around some (via keyboard, so i don't 'throw
away' my held instrument...)

WOOHOO!
i won't be on tonight, can someone test this????
(easiest way would be to equip horn, hold mandolin/lute, start heal and see
how much it's giving...)
if not, i'll test it myself tomorrow and report the results here

MacGrough
21st Song Bard
Solusek Ro Wanderers

----- Original Message -----
From: Rokenn Swiftsong <rokenn@...>
To: <EQBards@onelist.com>; <EQ-Bards@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, February 22, 2000 8:41 PM
Subject: [eqbards] Did some testing....


> From: "Rokenn Swiftsong" <rokenn@...>
>
> The Gypsy Lute (the one for the Lambent BP quest) gives +5% to songs in
> addition to +5% MR :)
>
> There is an interaction bug with instruments. If you have an instrument
> equipped and pickup in your mouse pointer another instrument of the same
> type (ie string, wind, brass,percussion) you will lose the instrument
bonus.
> if you pickup an instrument of the a different type (say Lute equipped,
> horn on mouse pointer) you get the full instrument effect. Having an
> instrument in your inventory of the same type has no effect on the song
you
> are playing (ie no fire beetle eye/lightstone effect).
>
> Rokenn Swiftsong - Karana server
